The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 12 July is 47,979 (5,553.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 07 July, there were 2,087 new confirmed cases (241.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 June, there were 1,180 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 77% (907 extra cases).
